description.value:
The Hiring of a Rogue Psyker to perform some some psychic power at the behest of the character. Degrees of success on Requisition Test determine quality DoS 1-2: Psy 2, WP 35, Per 35, Psyniscience | DoS 3-4: Psy 3, WP 45, Per 45, Psyniscience +10 | DoS 5+: Psy 4, WP 55, Per 55, Psyniscience +20.

Requirements

Considered one of the greatest dangers to mankind, Such Psykers often oppose the Imperium, lack control over their abilities, or even court Daemons.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
